episodes.title: The Cycle of Deprogramming from the CHM
episodes.description: In this episode of Beyond the Vow, Nick and Janelle discuss the deprogramming period after leaving the CHM. New (non-CHM) churches can feel strange, and we may feel guilt and loneliness. How do we adjust and how long does it take?

episodes.title: Interview with Ex-Member of The Church of God Restoration
episodes.description: In this 66th episode of Beyond the Vow, Nick and Janelle interview Stephen Nathaniel, a former member of the Church of God Restoration cult. Some of what he shares is heartbreaking and sheds light on some of the terrible things that are happening behind the closed doors of this cult.

episodes.title: Upcoming Guest announcement, Fertility Update and more
episodes.description: In this 65th episode of Beyond the Vow, Nick and Janelle announce an upcoming interview with a former member of the Church of God (Restoration) cult. We also discuss an update on our fertility journey, and we talk about trusting God's process even when things don't go quite the way we want them to.

episodes.title: Cult Profiles - Church of God (Restoration)
episodes.description: In this episode of Beyond the Vow, Nick and Janelle kick off a new series called "Cult Profiles". In this series, we begin by looking at the "Church of God (Restoration)" and its leader, Ray Tinsman. We analyze their beliefs and compare them to the word of God. Is it a cult? You will be shocked by some of their teachings.
